abstract: Andrew M. Cuomo, the attorney general of New York, claimed Merrill Lynch was misleading Congress over its plans to award billions of dollars in bonuses last December.
snippet: Andrew M. Cuomo, the attorney general of New York, claimed Merrill Lynch was misleading Congress over its plans to award billions of dollars in bonuses last December.
lead_paragraph: Andrew M. Cuomo, the attorney general of New York, claimed on Wednesday that Merrill Lynch misled Congress over the timing of its plans to award billions of dollars in bonuses last December.

headline.main: Cuomo Says Merrill Deceived Congress on Bonuses
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Says Merrill Deceived Congress on Bonuses

abstract: Bank of America has reportedly put a private bank it inherited from Merrill Lynch on the block, and the largest U.S. bank may try to sell other assets as well.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has reportedly put a private bank it inherited from Merrill Lynch on the block, and the largest U.S. bank may try to sell other assets as well.

headline.main: Bank of America May Get By Without Big Asset Sales

abstract: Kenneth D. Lewis, chief executive of Bank of America, said Thursday that the bank was profitable in January and February, echoing similar statements made this week by his counterparts at Citigroup and JPMorgan Chase.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth D. Lewis, chief executive of Bank of America, said Thursday that the bank was profitable in January and February, echoing similar statements made this week by his counterparts at Citigroup and JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: BofA Chief Joins the Earnings Hit Parade

abstract: In Charlotte, N.C., where Bank of America casts a long shadow, there is concern about the bank’s leadership.
snippet: In Charlotte, N.C., where Bank of America casts a long shadow, there is concern about the bank’s leadership.
lead_paragraph: CHARLOTTE, N.C.  Each workday, when the closing bell sounds on Wall Street, the mayor here in the Wall Street of the South takes stock of this city’s fortunes.

headline.main: A Besieged Bank, and Its Hometown, Look Inward
